column1:
いらっしゃいませ～！
癒しを求めるあなたへ『ラッキーオーラ』です♪

Welcome~!
The Lucky Aura is for those who seek healing ♪
column5:
Welcome~!
The Lucky Aura is for those who seek healing ♪

column1:

では、簡単にご説明させていただきま～す！

Ah, you must be a first-time customer!
Then I'll go ahead and briefly explain every~thing!
column5:
Ah, you must be a first-time customer!
Then I'll go ahead and briefly explain every~thing!

column1:
当店は心と体への癒しをメインとした、

We have a lot of products, but our shop focuses
on products that heal the mind and body ♪
column5:
We have a lot of products, but our shop focuses
on products that heal the mind and body ♪

column1:

By relaxing with our products, you'll feel
powerful! Err~ or something along that line!!
column5:
By relaxing with our products, you'll feel
powerful! Err~ or something along that line!!

column5:
I'll also give you a special gift today
for something we're putting on trial!

Oh yea, take this too!
